A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't know what I am more insulted by\, this crapfest of a movie that Disney thought would suffice or Rotten Tomatoes holding the audience score for said crapfest at 50% when anyone can clearly see it should be much lower.\n\nBoth should be ashamed of themselves.  As should whoever wrote this script.  And\, whoever the actress who played Rose\, she should too.
